input_variables.name: ISREASONINGINCLUDED
input_variables.description: Determines whether to include the reasoning behind the answer.

input_variables.name: SEARCHSTRING
input_variables.description: This is the search string or the question being asked of the book.

input_variables.name: PARAGRAPH
input_variables.description: These are the paragraph(s) from the SQL persisted store, where a potential answer can be found.
